column6: This spells costs 2 less to cast if it targets a tapped creature.\r\nExile target creature.
Destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater. Then create a Food token for each creature you control.

When Bill the Pony enters the battlefield, create two Food tokens.\r\nSacrifice a Food: Until end of turn, target creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

Vigilence\r\nWhenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.\r\nSacrifice Boromir, Warden of the Tower: Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. The Ring tempts you.

Dawn of a New Age enters the battlefield with a hope counter on it for each of the creature you control.\r\nAt the beginning of your end step, remove a hope counter from Dawn of a New Age. If you do, draw a card. Then if Dawn of a New Age has no hope counters on it, sacrifice it and you gain 4 life.
